languages.text: "Я понимаю. Но особенности моего ремесла делают меня прозорливым и способным зрить в корень — в отличие от миллионов богобоязненных и ревностных слуг Его. Поверьте, ваши слова легко истолковать иначе — особенно если к тому будет расположен разум вашего собеседника".

traits.locale_text: "Я понимаю. Но особенности моего ремесла делают меня прозорливым и способным зрить в корень — в отличие от миллионов богобоязненных и ревностных слуг Его. Поверьте, ваши слова легко истолковать иначе — особенно если к тому будет расположен разум вашего собеседника".

languages.text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю. Но особенности моего ремесла делают меня прозорливым и способным зрить в корень — в отличие от миллионов богобоязненных и ревностных слуг Его. Поверьте, ваши слова легко истолковать иначе — особенно если к тому будет расположен разум вашего собеседника".

traits.locale_text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me into a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

"I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me into a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

"I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

"I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

languages.text: “我能理解，但这是因为我这一行的特殊性赋予了我洞察力，让我得以看透事物的本质。然而，祂有着亿万虔诚的仆人，而并非每个人都有这样的能力。老实说，您的话很容易被人误解为别的意思，尤其当有人故意曲解您的意思时，更是如此。”
languages.original_text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

traits.locale_text: “我能理解，但这是因为我这一行的特殊性赋予了我洞察力，让我得以看透事物的本质。然而，祂有着亿万虔诚的仆人，而并非每个人都有这样的能力。老实说，您的话很容易被人误解为别的意思，尤其当有人故意曲解您的意思时，更是如此。”

languages.text: «Lo entiendo, pero las circunstancias de mi trabajo me han convertido en una persona perceptiva, capaz de ver la raíz de las cosas... al contrario que millones de Sus devotos sirvientes. Créame: sus palabras pueden interpretarse de otra forma con facilidad, especialmente si depende de alguien predispuesto para ello».
languages.original_text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Lo entiendo, pero las circunstancias de mi trabajo me han convertido en una persona perceptiva, capaz de ver la raíz de las cosas... al contrario que millones de Sus devotos sirvientes. Créame: sus palabras pueden interpretarse de otra forma con facilidad, especialmente si depende de alguien predispuesto para ello».

languages.text: 「わかりました。しかし、私の職業の特殊性により私は物事の根本を見抜くことができる洞察力のある人間になりました。何百万人もの敬虔なしもべとは違うのです。信じてください。あなたの言葉は、簡単に別のうがった解釈に利用される可能性があります。特に、常日頃からそうする傾向のある人には、ね」
languages.original_text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「わかりました。しかし、私の技術の特殊性により私は物事の根本を見抜くことができる洞察力のある人間になりました。何百万人もの敬虔なしもべとは違うのです。信じてください。あなたの言葉は、簡単に別のうがった解釈に利用される可能性があります。特に、常日頃からそうする傾向のある人には」
「わかりました。しかし、私の職業の特殊性により私は物事の根本を見抜くことができる洞察力のある人間になりました。何百万人もの敬虔なしもべとは違うのです。信じてください。あなたの言葉は、簡単に別のうがった解釈に利用される可能性があります。特に、常日頃からそうする傾向のある人には、ね」

languages.original_text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

languages.text: « Je comprends. Mais mon art m'a rendu suffisamment perspicace pour discerner le fond des choses, contrairement à des millions de Ses serviteurs zélés. Croyez-moi lorsque je vous dis que vos paroles pourraient être interprétées fort différemment, en particulier par ceux qui ne demandent pas mieux. »
languages.original_text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends. Mais mon art m'a rendu suffisamment perspicace pour discerner le fond des choses, contrairement à des millions de Ses serviteurs zélés. Croyez-moi lorsque je vous dis que vos paroles pourraient être interprétées fort différemment, en particulier par ceux qui ne demandent pas mieux. »

languages.text: "Ich verstehe. Aber die Besonderheiten meiner Profession haben meine Wahrnehmung gestärkt, sodass ich den Dingen auf den Grund sehen kann – anders als Millionen Seiner hingebungsvollen Diener. Glaubt mir, Eure Worte könnten leicht anders interpretiert werden, vor allem von solchen, die es darauf abgesehen haben."
languages.original_text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe. Aber die Besonderheiten meiner Profession haben meine Wahrnehmung gestärkt, sodass ich den Dingen auf den Grund sehen kann – anders als Millionen Seiner hingebungsvollen Diener. Glaubt mir, Eure Worte könnten leicht anders interpretiert werden, vor allem von solchen, die es darauf abgesehen haben."

languages.text: "Anlıyorum lakin mesleğimin incelikleri beni O'nun milyonlarca sofu hizmetkârının aksine, olayların ardını görebilen, sezgileri kuvvetli birine dönüştürdü. Güvenin bana, sözleriniz kolayca farklı biçimlerde yorumlanabilir. Bilhassa da buna meyilli kişilerce."
languages.original_text: "I understand. But the particularities of my craft have made me a perceptive individual capable of seeing through to the root of things — unlike millions of His devout servants. Trust me, your words could easily be interpreted a different way, especially by one inclined to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum lakin mesleğimin incelikleri beni O'nun milyonlarca sofu hizmetkârının aksine, olayların ardını görebilen, sezgileri kuvvetli biri hâline getirdi. Güvenin bana, sözleriniz kolayca farklı biçimlerde yorumlanabilir. Bilhassa da buna meyilli kişilerce."
